description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Logo' using the Remotion library for video composition. It imports various utilities from 'remotion', other components ('Arc', 'Atom'), and schema validation ('z', 'zColor'). The component generates an animated logo with rotation and scaling effects, parameterized by colors.

methods.name: Logo
methods.description: React functional component rendering animated logo with rotation and scaling based on video frame and config.
